name: Streambow
tag_list: broadband-internet, quality-of-experience, customer-experience, customer-complaint, network-monitoring, iptv-diagnosis, smartphone-experience-app
overview: Streambow develops innovative Quality of Experience (QoE) diagnostic and monitoring solutions for telecommunication companies and internet service providers. Introducing a new QoE measurement approach, Streambow’s solutions generate quality metrics from the end user perspective, allowing the operator to really detect network and device issues that affect their customers. Streambow’s solutions are ideal for a variety of broadband access technologies, including FTTx, Mobile Internet, xDSL, IPTV, DOCSIS Cable, Wi-Fi and WiMAX. Software clients, Smartphone Apps, web-based agents or hardware probes provide comprehensive end-to-end testing, diagnosis and monitoring, troubleshooting network problems and assuring network service quality parameters from an end customer perspective.
